function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High oil and gas prices and volatility resulting from cuts in investment","Impact":"Economic constraints and increased energy costs","Mitigation":"Diversifying energy sources and investments in sustainable energy","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy efficiency measures","People":"Consumers, businesses, and economies reliant on fossil fuels","Owner":"Governments, energy companies, and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Financial practices supporting fossil fuel industries and investments","Impact":"Continued reliance on fossil fuels and slow transition to sustainable energy","Mitigation":"Regulation of subsidies, incentives for sustainable energy, and divestment from fossil fuel industries","Technologies":"Financial technology for tracking investments, sustainable energy financing solutions","People":"Fossil fuel companies, governments, and financial institutions","Owner":"Policy makers, financial regulators, and industry leaders"}]}
